tool_description: Diagnoses common technical issues with photography equipment and provides troubleshooting steps and workarounds for wedding event scenarios.

equipment_type.description: Type of equipment experiencing issues (camera, lens, flash, memory_card, battery, tripod)

error_messages: Invalid equipment type: Use camera, lens, flash, memory_card, battery, or tripod.
No symptoms provided: Describe at least one symptom or error message.
Invalid urgency level: Use critical, high, medium, or low.
Unrecognized symptom: Provide clear descriptions of the technical problems observed.
usage: Specify the equipment type having issues, describe the symptoms, and set the urgency level. Include any available backup equipment. The tool will provide diagnostic steps and solutions.

diagnosis.description: Likely cause of the technical issue
